resources.string: Place traps to reveal roles of players who stay in them.
Place traps around the map. Players who stay in traps long enough will have their roles revealed to you at the next meeting.
The Revealer is a Crewmate role that can place traps around the map. When players stay in a trap for a certain amount of time, their roles are revealed to the Revealer at the next meeting.
Place a trap at your current location. Players who stay in the trap for the required duration will have their roles revealed to you.
No players were caught in your traps.
Not enough players were caught in your traps.
Place traps on vents. Players who use trapped vents will be immobilized for a duration.
The Trapper is a Crewmate role that can place traps on vents. When players use a trapped vent, they are immobilized for a duration and the Trapper is notified.
Place a trap on a vent. Players who use this vent will be caught and immobilized.
You were caught in a trap in <room>!
You have no task list, task arrows, or map task locations. Tasks still function normally and contribute to the task bar.
The Clueless modifier removes all task guidance including the task list, task arrows/markers, and map task locations. Tasks still function normally and contribute to the task bar.
